statements: SELECT * FROM golf_courses;
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT course_name, course_layout FROM golf_courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE course_id > 3 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM golf_courses WHERE location IN ('California', 'Florida') ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses WHERE course_layout LIKE '%challenging%';
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM golf_courses GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses;
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses;
SELECT course_id, location, number_of_holes FROM golf_courses WHERE number_of_holes > 18;
SELECT course_name, location, par FROM golf_courses JOIN course_layouts ON golf_courses.course_id = course_layouts.course_id;
SELECT course_name, location, length FROM golf_courses JOIN course_layouts ON golf_courses.course_id = course_layouts.course_id WHERE par = 3;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE number_of_holes > 18;
SELECT course_name, par, length FROM golf_courses JOIN course_layouts ON golf_courses.course_id = course_layouts.course_id WHERE par = 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT location, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM golf_courses GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_courses DESC;

SELECT course_name, SUM(length) AS total_length FROM golf_courses JOIN course_layouts ON golf_courses.course_id = course_layouts.course_id GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_length > 5000 ORDER BY total_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE location='Florida'
SELECT course_name, course_layout FROM golf_courses WHERE course_id=3
SELECT golfer_name, age, handicap FROM golfers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY handicap ASC
SELECT * FROM course_details WHERE difficulty='Challenging'
SELECT * FROM golf_courses WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT golfer_id, golfer_name FROM golfers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY golfer_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, location, par, difficulty FROM golf_courses JOIN course_details ON golf_courses.course_id = course_details.course_id WHERE par < 72 AND difficulty = 'Intermediate';
SELECT course_name, par, yardage, difficulty FROM golf_courses JOIN course_details ON golf_courses.course_id = course_details.course_id ORDER BY yardage DESC;
SELECT golfer_name, age, handicap FROM golfers WHERE handicap < 10 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses;
SELECT name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT player_id, name FROM golf_players ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM golf_courses_schedule WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, score FROM tournament_results WHERE score >= 70 AND position <= 3;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT course_id, date, start_time FROM golf_courses_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT player_id, name, handicap FROM golf_players WHERE gender = 'M' ORDER BY handicap DESC;
SELECT tournament_id, player_id, score, position FROM tournament_results WHERE score > 70 AND position <= 3 ORDER BY score ASC;
SELECT * FROM golf_courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name, location FROM golf_courses ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM golfers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT hole_number, par, yardage FROM course_layouts JOIN holes ON course_layouts.layout_id = holes.layout_id WHERE layout_id = 1 ORDER BY hole_number ASC;
SELECT course_name, location FROM golf_courses WHERE location = 'Florida';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM golfers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT course_name, location, par FROM golf_courses JOIN course_layouts ON golf_courses.course_id = course_layouts.course_id WHERE course_name LIKE '%Hills%' ORDER BY par DESC;
SELECT golfer_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM scores GROUP BY golfer_id HAVING total_score > 50 ORDER BY total_score DESC;

SELECT course_name, COUNT(hole_id) AS total_holes FROM golf_courses JOIN course_layouts ON golf_courses.course_id = course_layouts.course_id JOIN holes ON course_layouts.layout_id = holes.layout_id GROUP BY course_name ORDER BY total_holes DESC;
